phrs.translation: 饥饿, 饿死, 挨饿, 绝食
饥饿糖尿病, 饥饿性糖尿病, 翻译
低于基本工资的费用, 不够维持基本生活的工资

饿死掉的, 死于饥饿, 活活饿死, 不够维持基本生活的工资

sentences.sentence: Starvation brings biochemical changes in the body.
sentences.translation: 饥饿引起体内的生化变化。

sentences.sentence: I was suffering from acute sunstroke, starvation and exhaustion.
sentences.translation: 我当时正受着急性中暑、饥饿和疲惫之苦。

sentences.sentence: Millions will face starvation next year as a result of the drought.
sentences.translation: 由于发生旱灾，明年将有数百万人面临饥饿的威胁。
